>I concur with the other Chip's com=
ments... I thought the book was geared
>to beginners.  It seemed to me to n=
ot be anything more than glorified
>documentation for the different tools, =
which you can easily get on the
>web.

This is the big reason why I refuse =
to put any Javadoc in our upcoming book. I think it's a cheap way to extend=
 a book *and* it makes a book out-of-date before it should be.

That is not=
 a personal criticism of any author who has recently put Javadoc in their b=
ooks. Don't yell at me. It's just my opinion.
